website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour BAM received mixed reviews from the buyers. On the one hand, it was considered visually appealing but, on the other hand, there were quite a few criticisms about various aspects of the trainer. While about half of the users were able to attain the right fit and enjoyed using the shoe for their workouts, the other half was put off by the pinching and chafing sensations caused by the trainer. Due to the controversies, the shoe has not become the customers’ top pick.
pros: More than half of the purchasers were satisfied with the shoe’s performance during cross-training sessions
The style and color options of the trainer appealed to most reviewers
Some customers mentioned that the shoe ran true to size and offered a spot-on fit
cons: A good number of wearers complained about the stiff heel in the upper
it rubbed against their skin causing discomfort and blisters
More than a few people were disgruntled by the shoe’s fit
for them, it felt tight and uncomfortable
The sole lacked cushioning, according to several users

customer_reviews.title: Not great for working out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for CrossFit. The first pair was a little too big. Exchanged them for a half size smaller than normal and they fit better. I gave them 2 stars because the heel is very rigid and ripped the skin around the Achilles’ tendon. They might be good if you aren’t doing anything particularly active in them, but if you plan on working out in them, I would try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality! Wore out in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these jeans for work. I stand all day at a resort. They wore out in lass than a month. They became thin in the seat and actually frayed apart on both sides of the main seam. They wore out so fast i was still able to return them and get a refund. Poor poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Speed&Angels

customer_reviews.title: Like them but...
customer_reviews.text: In my case wearing a 9 1/2 I would probably be a bit more comfortable had I order a 10. Still wearable but a little snug, but I do like them!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Fit, comfort, style and stability all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: First pair of under armor shoes. Love them! Replaced a pair of Nike metcon 3. Way more comfortable. I have done 3 days of CrossFit workout in them so far. The shoes did amazing in box jumps, rope jumping and mile run! I am thinking about get a second pair for everyday wear. Fit, comfort, style and stability all ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I’m recommending them to everyone in my gym!
customer_reviews.author: Dbrice

customer_reviews.title: Spot on cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great cross trainer. I find it very stable no more rocky sponginess from my runners when doing a variety of strength and mobility exercises. The fabric is also very firm and holds you in place with a pretty low toe box. I take them off right after my workout as I don’t want to walk around in them but I love them during the workout.
customer_reviews.author: Hyphen Boy

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: i bought this pair based on a recommended top 10 shoes for fitness based on the fact that I'm used to NB Minimal and zero drop shoes I've loved in the past. The review was spot on except for the fact that they feel like slippers, they fir so well. My only complaint is my feet are wide, and at the moment I have an nerve problem in my right foot, I need a tad more room in the side.
customer_reviews.author: Tom De See

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I had never run more than a mile, I ran 5.5 in these shoes with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: WilderDude

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean lines
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with UA!!!! Nice clean lines. Roomy and comfortable. A great looking shoe. Would have given it 5 stars but this shoes wasn't ass light weight as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Will give you blister
customer_reviews.text: Worst shoes ever designed. The buttom of the lace is as hard as a rock. Will give you blister pain. I dont know who the hell designed this shoes but he should be fired.
customer_reviews.author: Thoai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My teen loved these!! He mentioned needing to get used to the padding on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these recently. Wore them for like 10 time and the outsoles have started separating since it's only glued to the body of the shoe. Not sure how much longer I can wear them before they come off completely. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sattar

customer_reviews.title: Great materials
customer_reviews.text: I got blisters when I first tried them. After a couple of months they feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them.
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe is pretty rough and had a sharper edge that gave me terrible blisters. Never had this happen before with Under Armour shoes, so if you plan on wearing low cut socks, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Great color- Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Fits great and is holding up well !
customer_reviews.author: MISSU2277

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my Grandson and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncormfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very stiff and uncomfortable, the heel area is stiff and rubs constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Friesen

customer_reviews.title: My husband got these for his coaching shoes on game ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for his coaching shoes on game day. He's gotten tons of compliments and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the design and fit
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift for my brother, he absolutely loved them! Said they broke-in in an evening of casual wear. He tells me that all of the negative comments just aren't accurate.
customer_reviews.author: techguy

customer_reviews.title: Flat feet only
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has serious design issue and is not for people with high arch. They look good though. Bought it and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Olechnowicz

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Bam Trainer Sneaker
product_meta.description: One-piece knit forefoot for great support & fit. Molded rear quarter panel provides extra padding . Dynamic webbed lacing system locks down the heel & the instep. Die-cut, full-length EVA sockliner for underfoot comfort & great fit. Full length EVA midsole with Charged Cushioning in the heel for the ultimate blend of cushioning & support . Solid rubber outsole with micro traction pattern for excellent grip on a variety of surfaces. Wrapped outsole construction extends around your foot for additional traction & support on lateral movement. Offset: 8 mm. Weight: 10.44 oz. .
feature_bullets: One piece knit forefoot for great support & fit
Molded rear quarter panel provides extra padding
Dynamic webbed lacing system locks down the heel & the instep
Die cut, full length EVA sockliner for underfoot comfort & great fit
Full length EVA midsole with Charged Cushioning in the heel for the ultimate blend of cushioning & support
